sn10.6:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya dhammapadāni bhāsati. Atha kho piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī puttakaṁ evaṁ tosesi:
sn10.6:2: "Mā saddaṁ kari piyaṅkara,Bhikkhu dhammapadāni bhāsati;Api ca dhammapadaṁ vijāniya,Paṭipajjema hitāya no siyā.
sn10.6:3: Pāṇesu ca saṁyamāmase,Sampajānamusā na bhaṇāmase;Sikkhema susīlyamattano,Api muccema pisācayoniyā"ti.
